Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/49th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 51st, Union, 49th AND Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/49th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 51st, Union, 49th AND Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/49th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
